about.summary: Advanced tryCatch() and try() functions for better error handling (logging, stack trace with source code references and support for post-mortem analysis via dump files).
Advanced tryCatch() and try() functions for better error handling (logging, stack trace with source code references and support for post-mortem analysis via dump files).

name: r-trycatchlog
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.3.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-trycatchlog
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/tryCatchLog_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/tryCatchLog/tryCatchLog_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0da89a028d14bb865b9fc17cabdafe3bfafc8b2e10b86965cbaaf28f1151804c

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('tryCatchLog')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('tryCatchLog')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/aryoda/tryCatchLog
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Advanced tryCatch() and try() functions for better error handling (logging, stack trace with source code references and support for post-mortem analysis via dump files).
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - tobiasraabe

# Package: tryCatchLog
# Title: Advanced 'tryCatch()' and 'try()' Functions
# Version: 1.2.1
# Authors@R: c( person("Juergen", "Altfeld", email = "jaltfeld@altfeld-im.de", role = c("aut", "cre", "cph")), person("Charles", "Epaillard", email = "charles.epaillard@gmail.com", role = "ctb"), person("Brandon", "Bertelsen", email = "brandon@bertelsen.ca", role = "ctb") )
# Description: Advanced tryCatch() and try() functions for better error handling (logging, stack trace with source code references and support for post-mortem analysis via dump files).
# Imports: utils
# Depends: R (>= 3.1.0)
# License: GPL-3 | file LICENSE
# URL: https://github.com/aryoda/tryCatchLog
# BugReports: https://github.com/aryoda/tryCatchLog/issues
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 7.1.0
# Suggests: futile.logger, testthat, knitr, rmarkdown, covr
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-11-24 16:57:02 UTC; juergen

# Maintainer: Juergen Altfeld <jaltfeld@altfeld-im.de>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-11-25 05:20:02 UTC
